column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was one of the best things I tasted while I was in Chicago.  The salad was an awesome bland of sweet with savory and just went well with the pizza.  From Lou Malnati's site
column7: crumbled Volpi salami and gorgonzola cheese. Tossed with Lou's famous dressing with a touch of romano cheese." A great blend of ingredients.
